name: Teleport Tower
description:
Teleport Tower is a first-person, 3D puzzle game in which the player must complete various puzzles to progress through the game. The first-person controller must interact with various elements within the game to help complete puzzles. They must also teleport short distances to reach higher platforms. 

Credits:

- Skybox Volume 2 (Nebula) by Hedgehog Team - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/sky/skybox-volume-2-...
- Realistic Tree 9 [Rainbow Tree] by Rakshi Games - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/vegetation/trees/realistic-tree-9-rainb...
- Tree (Mediterranean) by Immortal Factory - https://assetstore.unity.com/publishers/20293
- Korea native trees by Yongho Kim - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/vegetation/trees/korea-native-trees-771...
